sentence.Network_en: I noticed, behind the neutrality of his gaze, a deep weariness.
sentence.Network_cn: 我注意到他不露声色的注视背后藏着深深的厌倦。

sentence.Network_en: He showed absolutely no signs of weariness.
Despite his weariness, Brand mustered a wan smile.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽然精疲力竭，布兰德还是无力地笑了笑。

entry.def: If you are weary, you are very tired.

example.tran: 雷切尔看起来脸色苍白，疲惫不堪。

entry.tran: 不再感兴趣的;感到厌烦的
entry.def: If you are weary of something, you have become tired of it and have lost your enthusiasm for it.

example.ex: They're getting awfully weary of this silly war...
example.tran: 他们越来越厌烦这场无聊的战争。

example.ex: She was weary of being alone.

entry.def: If you weary of something or it wearies you, you become tired of it and lose your enthusiasm for it.

example.ex: The public had wearied of his repeated warnings of a revolution that never seemed to start...
example.tran: 他一再预警的革命迟迟没有开始，公众已对此感到厌倦。

example.ex: He had wearied of teaching in state universities...
example.tran: 他已经厌烦了在州立大学教书。

means.word_mean: 1. temporary loss of strength and energy resulting from hard physical or mental work;

sentences.sentence: "growing fatigue was apparent from the decline in the execution of their athletic skills"
"weariness overcame her after twelve hours and she fell asleep"

auth_sentence.content: Desert imagery becomes a metaphor forwashed-up, strung-out weariness.
auth_sentence.res_content: Desert imagery becomes a metaphor forwashed-up, strung-out weariness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Desert imagery becomes a metaphor forwashed-up, strung-out weariness.

auth_sentence.content: This weariness is not eased by lying down but worsened.
auth_sentence.res_content: This weariness is not eased by lying down but worsened.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This weariness is not eased by lying down but worsened.

auth_sentence.content: His letters show resilience but gradually weariness does set in.
auth_sentence.res_content: His letters show resilience but gradually weariness does set in.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His letters show resilience but gradually weariness does set in.

sentences.en: His cheerful joke made us forget our weariness.
sentences.cn: 他讲的令人愉快的笑话使我们忘记了疲劳。

sentences.en: His eyes were half closing in weariness.
sentences.cn: 他疲倦得眼睛都快睜不开了。

sentences.en: I detected a faint note of weariness in his voice.
sentences.cn: 我从他的声音中察觉出一丝倦意。
